title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Its easy to feel like youre responsible for the happiness of your loved ones. Although your intentions are kind, you could say too much in your attempt to remedy a bad situation or to cheer someone up today. Unfortunately, you may go overboard in speech or deed to ensure a happy outcome. However, it can be crushing for everyone involved if that doesnt pan out as you hoped. The truth is you might not know exactly what to do to improve their circumstances now. Ask how you can help, but dont interfere unless youre invited. Allow your grace and compassion to guide your heart. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
